trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism to modify or insert custom extensions across an entire service, including the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种机制来修改或插入自定义扩展跨整个服务，包括<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Implement IServiceBehavior to modify, examine, or extend some aspect of service-wide execution at the application level: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> method to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
trans-unit.target: 实现 IServiceBehavior 可以修改、 检查或扩展应用程序级别的服务范围执行的某些方面:-使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>方法可以更改运行时属性值或插入自定义扩展对象，例如错误处理程序、 消息或参数拦截器、 安全扩展以及其他自定义扩展对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A> method to examine the description before [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] constructs the executing service to confirm that it can execute properly.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A>方法前检查说明[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]构造正在执行的服务，以确认它可以正确执行。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> method to pass to a binding element the custom information for the service so that it can support the service correctly.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>方法可以向绑定元素传递服务的自定义信息，以便它可正确的支持服务。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: IServiceBehavior objects can make use of any of these methods, but often only one is important; in such cases the unused methods can return without a value.
trans-unit.target: IServiceBehavior 对象可使用所有这些方法，但通常只一个不太大。在这种情况下未使用的方法可不带值返回。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All of the IServiceBehavior methods pass <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> objects as a parameters.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 所有 IServiceBehavior 方法传递<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName>对象作为参数。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> parameter is for examination only; if you modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>参数只用于检查; 如果您修改这些对象的执行行为将不确定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: To perform the customization task for which it is intended, the IServiceBehavior object must be added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> property prior to the construction of the service runtime.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行所针对的自定义任务，必须将 IServiceBehavior 对象添加到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>属性，然后在构造服务运行时。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are three ways to do this: - Programmatically add the custom service behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A> property prior to the point where the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 有三种方法来执行此操作:-以编程方式添加到自定义服务行为<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>之前的点的属性其中<xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法调用<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Behaviors%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Create a custom attribute that implements IServiceBehavior and use it to mark service classes that are to be modified.
trans-unit.target: -创建实现 IServiceBehavior 的自定义特性，并使用它来标记要修改的服务类。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object is constructed, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses reflection to discover the attributes on the service type.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>构造对象时，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]使用反射来发现服务类型上的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: If any attributes implement IServiceBehavior, they are added to the behaviors collection on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 如果有属性实现 IServiceBehavior，它们将添加到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>上的行为集合

trans-unit.source: - Extend the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName> class to support the specification of the behavior in an application or machine configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 扩展<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName>类，以支持的应用程序或计算机配置文件的行为规范。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: See the Example section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例部分以了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Examples of service behaviors in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> attribute, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> behavior.
trans-unit.target: 中的服务行为的示例[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]包括<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>属性， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>行为。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to pass custom data to binding elements to support the contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供将自定义数据传递到绑定元素以支持协定实现的功能。

trans-unit.source: Use the AddBindingParameters method to add custom data objects to the `parameters` collection that binding elements can use to acquire extra information to enable them to support the contract.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AddBindingParameters 方法将添加到自定义数据对象`parameters`绑定元素可用于获取额外信息，从而使它们能支持协定的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called once for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: 每个侦听 URI 一次调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a service has four endpoints, and two of them have the same listen URI, then this method gets called three times.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果服务有四个终结点，其中两个侦听 URI 相同，则此方法被调用三次。

trans-unit.source: The reason is that the `bindingParameters` target each channel stack and there is one channel stack for each listen URI.
trans-unit.target: 原因在于`bindingParameters`定位所有通道堆栈，并且没有为每个侦听 URI 的一个通道堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Because each call receives those endpoints at that listen URI, two calls each get a single <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName>, and one call gets a collection of two <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: 由于每次调用接收这些终结点在侦听 URI，因此有两个调用各自获得一个<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName>，和一个调用将会获得两个集合<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> methods pass <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> objects as a parameters.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的所有<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>方法通过<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName>对象作为参数。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>参数是用于检查和插入仅自定义项; 如果您修改这些对象的执行行为是不确定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的服务说明。

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务宿主。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的绑定元素可访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter interceptors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供的功能，可以更改运行时属性值或插入自定义扩展对象，例如错误处理程序、 消息或参数拦截器、 安全扩展以及其他自定义扩展对象。

trans-unit.source: Implement the ApplyDispatchBehavior method to inspect or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> object that is being constructed in order to support some custom execution scenario.
trans-unit.target: 实现 ApplyDispatchBehavior 方法可检查或修改<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>为了支持某些自定义执行方案正在构造的对象。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> methods pass <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> objects as a parameters.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的所有<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>方法通过<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName>对象作为参数。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>参数是用于检查和插入仅自定义项; 如果您修改这些对象的执行行为是不确定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明。

trans-unit.source: The host that is currently being built.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在生成的主机。

trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to inspect the service host and the service description to confirm that the service can run successfully.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于检查服务主机和服务说明，从而确定服务可以成功运行。

trans-unit.source: Use the Validate method to confirm whether the current service can execute properly according to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 使用了 Validate 方法，以确认是否当前的服务可以根据你的方案正确执行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> methods pass <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> objects as a parameters.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的所有<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>方法通过<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName>对象作为参数。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> parameter is for examination and insertion of customizations only; if you otherwise modify these objects the execution behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>参数是用于检查和插入仅自定义项; 如果您修改这些对象的执行行为是不确定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明。

trans-unit.source: The service host that is currently being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在构建服务主机。
